title: @Riot: Academy Skins Bundle
body: So Riot... When the Academy Skins come out are they gonna be in a bundle? Say yes and you got a buyer.

replies.body:
Hiya Bunny153539,

We don't have plans to make an Academy bundle when these skins are released. Sorry!
Please Riot, make a 1 day academy bundle. I beg, this is the only budnle i wil ever buy.
Same if its not to expensive :D
